title: Magdalena Lederbauer
text:
What’s New

[24/03] I started working as a research intern in the Laboratory of Artificial Chemical Intelligence (LIAC) at EPFL! I will be working with Philippe Schwaller and Andres M. Bran on Large Language Models in Chemistry.
